thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Asia Pacific Strategic Investments To Buy Shares In Capital Of IPC Corporation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Asia Pacific Strategic Investments To Buy Shares In Capital Of IPC Corporation
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Asia Pacific Strategic Investments Ltd :
* ASIA PACIFIC STRATEGIC INVESTMENTS LTD ANNOUNCES ‍PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF SHARES IN CAPITAL OF IPC CORPORATION LTD
* CONSIDERATION FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION WILL BE SATISFIED BY ALLOTMENT AND ISSUANCE OF CONSIDERATION SHARES​
* ‍AGGREGATE VALUE OF CONSIDERATION FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION IS S$21.3 MILLION, FOR PROPOSED TRANSACTIONS IS S$45.4 MILLION‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
